item.title: 科研工作流程
item.description: 每个科研工作者都有自己的科研工作流程，我倾向于利用不同的软件组合来提高工作效率。我一开始舍本逐末尝试了许多软件，导致工作流程越来越模糊，效率

item.title: 我与咖啡
item.description: 2016 年大学毕业后，我决心考取研究生，便在校内租了一个单间复习。房间虽然不大，却也附带了一床、一柜、一桌、一空调、一卫生间和一小院子，而且房东爷

item.title: 什么叫做自己
item.description: 果麦麦对罗翔老师的部分采访稿： 果麦麦：“罗老师，你觉得什么叫做自己呢？” 罗翔老师：“什么叫做自己？你自己都不知道你是谁，你怎么能做自己？” 罗

item.title: About
item.description: The more you know who you are and what you want, the less you let things upset you. This site Why blogging? It’s cool. It’s personalized. To accumulate a sense of achievement. This site is powered by Hugo with Pandoc being the default Markdown handler, deployed on a Huawei cloud server, and supported by Upyun CDN. Part of the layout and CSS style use

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Personal Information Name: CHEN, Hua (陈华) Email: huachen@mails.ccnu.edu.cn Homepage: https://www.chen.fun/ ORCID iD: 0000-0001-9669-1683 Research Interests Modified Gravity; Dark Energy; Dark Matter Education Background 2017 ~ 2020, Master of Science, College of Physical Science and Technology, Central China Normal University. 2012 ~ 2016, Bachelor of Science, College of Physical Science and Technology, Central China Normal University. Publications Please check inSPIRE for more details. Published H. Chen, T. Katsuragawa,

item.title: 关于
item.description: 莫听穿林打叶声，何妨吟啸且徐行。竹杖芒鞋轻胜马，谁怕？一蓑烟雨任平生。料峭春风吹酒醒，微冷，山头斜照却相迎。回首向来萧瑟处，归去，也无风雨也
